View My Alerts IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE As requested your News Alert for YHOO follows from E quityAlertcom GotMarketing Teams with Yahoo Small Business Agreemen t Makes GotMarketings Campaigner Tools Available to Yahoo Small Business Users CAMPBELL Calif Oct BUSINESS WIRE GotMarketingTM wwwgotmarketingcom a leading provider of selfserve email marketing to ols today announced an agreement with Yahoo Inc NasdaqYHOO a leading global Internet communications commerce and media company to offer GotMa rketings CampaignerTMemail marketing tools to businesses using YahooR Store Yahoo Website Services oocom and Yahoo Small Business Thro ugh the term of the agreement Yahoo will offer a branded fully integrate d version of Campaigner giving businesses convenient access to the suite o f email marketing tools The agreement gives businesses a fast and costeff ective way of reaching customers to drive sales build businesses brands a nd strengthen customer relationships Our email marketing tools are a co nvenient costeffective way for businesses to send customized marketing pi eces said Eric Melka Vice President of Marketing and Business Developmen t GotMarketing We are pleased to deliver our email marketing tools and t echnology to Yahoos small business users to help them cultivate customer relationships in order to increase revenue Yahoos selfserve offering of Campaigner includes automated list building list management message p ersonalization campaign distribution response tracking and realtime repo rting HTML templates wizards and tips throughout GotMarketings emai l marketing tools add to the suite of tools and services Yahoo offers busi nesses to help them reach new customers save time and money and grow sale s said Nate Smith Senior Producer Yahoo Small Business Our agreement with GotMarketing supports our strategy of offering competitive features a nd valueadded services that help businesses succeed Yahoo Small Busin ess offers a suite of resources and soluti ons to enable small businesses to establish and grow a business presence on the Web Yahoo Small Business offers essential solutions such as Yahoo S tore Yahoo Mail Business Edition Yahoo Website Services and Yahoo domains that allow small businesses to establish an online presence and sel l online In addition Yahoo Small Business helps businesses leverage the Yahoo network to develop effective online marketing and promotional strate gies Yahoo Small Business also provides relevant resources such as busine ss planning content and tools office supply shopping and mailroom resource s as well as pertinent news and information all of which help small bus inesses grow business and manage daily operations About GotMarketing Go tMarketingTM wwwgotmarketingcom offers a suite of selfserve email ma rketing tools that help businesses attract and retain customers The Campai gnerTM suite of Webbased software applications makes it easy for organiz ations with limited marketing resources to create and distribute permission based email campaigns and measure their performance The company is headqu artered in Silicon Valley California with offices in Ottawa and Montreal Canada For more information please visit wwwgotmarketingcom c GotCompany Inc GotMarketing Campaigner and GotCompany are trademarks of GotCompany Inc Yahoo and the Yahoo logos are trademarks andor register ed trademarks of Yahoo Inc All other names are trademarks andor register ed trademarks of their respective owners CONTACT GotMarketing Carolyn Gardner ext Fax URL View My Alerts IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE As requested your News Alert for QCOM follows from E quityAlertcom QUALCOMM and KTFreeTel Reach Agreement to Commercially Launch BREWEnabled Handsets and Services to Customers in November DA greement Announced at PTWireless Networks Comm Beijing Leading Kor ean Carrier is First in the World to Launch BREW Service BEIJING Oct BUSINESS WIRE QUALCOMM Incorporated Nasdaq QCOM pioneer and world leader of Code Division Multiple Access CDMA digital wireless techn ology and KTFreeTel a leading Korean wireless carrier today announced at the PTWireless Networks Comm Beijing conference that the companies have reached an agreement for the commercial launch of KTFreeTels applica tions service based on QUALCOMMs Binary Runtime Environment for WirelessT M BREWTM platform KTFreeTel expects to roll out its BREWenabled magi c n multipackTM service to subscribers on their thirdgeneration G CDM A X network beginning November KTFreeTel will be the first ca rrier in the world to launch BREW platform services and provide customers w ith the ability to download wireless applications over the air anytime anywhere KTFreeTels commitment to QUALCOMMs BREW platform represents a bold advancement toward the future of useful wireless data services sai d Peggy Johnson president of QUALCOMM Internet Services the division of Q UALCOMM responsible for the complete BREW solution KTFreeTels customer f ocus combined with QUALCOMMs technology leadership takes full advantage of the improved capabilities of todays mobile devices to bring truly relev ant useful solutions to market For the first time people will be able to choose the applications and features they want and the BREW platforms ab ility to download applications over the air is the breakthrough that enable s this The agreement was announced at a ceremony featuring Dr Joo Youn g Song senior vice president KTFreeTel Multimedia Business Division and P eggy Johnson This agreement with QUALCOMM further enhances KTFreeTels technology leadership and market strategy said Dr Song Weve created a muchneeded solution that will put the power to personalize cell phone ser vices over the air directly in the hands of consumers KTFreeTel condu cted a successful public user trial of the BREWenabled magic n multipack s ervice with users in September and October The BREWenabled ser vice allows KTFreeTel subscribers to easily download and install a variety of applications in a matter of seconds For KTFreeTels customers this mea ns that the same BREWenabled handset hardware can provide very different c apabilities tailored to individual interests as subscribers download the ap plications they want from various categories such as games and entertainme nt business applications messaging and navigation services More than applications are currently available from more than companies includin g Anicom Gaeasoft GeoTel and LycosJavagame KTFreeTels BREW services will launch on two new CDMA X BREWenabled handsets LG Electron ics CX phone features a color display a clamshell design a nd dual LCD screen Samsungs SPHX phone has a color display a clamshell design and features Samsungs melody maker that uses a chord progression Details of the business agreement between QU ALCOMM and KTFreeTel were not disclosed QUALCOMMs BREW platform is a th in standardized execution environment that resides in handsets Native BRE W applications are written in CC While the BREW platform supports progr amming in other languages such as Java CC is used as a primary languag e by significantly more developers worldwide than any other language accor ding to International Data Corp QUALCOMMs BREW initiative is the only app roach that offers developers OEMs and carriers a complete endtoend solu tion for wireless applications development device configuration applicati on distribution and billing and payment The complete BREW solution includ es the BREW Software Development KitTM SDK for developers the BREW app lication platform and porting tools for device manufacturers and the BREW Distribution System BDS that enables developers and their carrier custome rs to get applications to market and coordinates the billing and payment pr ocesses for them Carriers BREW services will enable consumers to customiz e their handsets by downloading applications over the air from a carriers application download server QUALCOMM Incorporated wwwqualcommcom is a leader in developing and delivering innovative digital wireless communica tions products and services based on the Companys CDMA digital technology The Companys business areas include CDMA chipsets and system software te chnology licensing the BREW applications platform EudoraR email softwa re digital cinema systems and satellitebased systems including portions of the GlobalstarTM system and wireless fleet management systems OmniTRA CSR and OmniExpressR QUALCOMM owns patents that are essential to all o f the CDMA wireless telecommunications standards that have been adopted or proposed for adoption by standardssetting bodies worldwide QUALCOMM has l icensed its essential CDMA patent portfolio to more than telecommunicat ions equipment manufacturers worldwide Headquartered in San Diego Calif QUALCOMM is included in the S Index and is a FORTUNE R compa ny traded on The Nasdaq Stock MarketR under the ticker symbol QCOM Exc ept for the historical information contained herein this news release may contain forwardlooking statements including but not limited to express o r implied statements regarding the performance of demand for and sales of BREWenabled units or BREW applications that are subject to risks and un certainties including the extent and speed to which the BREW platform is a dopted and accepted by consumers and applications developers change in eco nomic conditions of the various markets QUALCOMM serves as well as the oth er risks
